Topic.Title: Ravian Gaming Industries presents: Empires of the Medieval age

Posts.EditableText: Empires if the Medieval age is a choose your own adventure game based in the medieval times. You can start as a farmer, thief, or wanderer and can end up as the richest king in the world! Or perhaps you prefer to have the simple life of a merchant or blacksmith or other trade, the possibilities are endless!* Here's the link to the demo
Posts.HTML:
Empires if the Medieval age is a choose your own adventure game based in the medieval times. You can start as a farmer, thief, or wanderer and can end up as the richest king in the world! Or perhaps you prefer to have the simple life of a merchant or blacksmith or other trade, the possibilities are endless!*

Here's the link to the demo

Posts.EditableText: Good new fans! The full Farm Boy demo is now available! Go check out the story so far at the demo link in the post above! Thanks for your support!

Posts.EditableText: Hope you all had a great Thanks Giving! We've been working on a treat for you as well! The Pure rebellion story line is now available! Find it in the game and tell us what you think!
